articles.title: Surprise, surprise: Silksong wins Steam’s Game of the Year
articles.description: Valve has announced the winners of the 2025 Steam Awards and, unsurprisingly, Hollow Knight: Silksong, took home the Game of the Year honors. articles.title: Someone made a ton of money betting on Maduro’s capture
articles.description: Shortly before the US military launched an attack on Venezuela and captured President Nicolás Maduro, an account on Polymarket made some very suspiciously timed investments. The prediction market had been running bets on when or if Maduro would be removed from power, with prices for "out by January 31, 2026" as low as $0.07 late […]
